Affliction.name: pain
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: you died because of pain shock

Affliction.name: Ripped soul
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You opened the box and now you must go and taste exessive pleasures

WarpBurn.name: Warp burn
WarpBurn.description: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets. The patient is in a great deal of pain.

Affliction.name: Brain stimulation
Affliction.description: the mental capabilities of the patient have increased significantly

Affliction.name: Radiation sickness
Affliction.description: Burns and sores can be seen on patient's skin. They seem to be spreading.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of radiation sickness.
